title: Online Mathematics Learning Design and Strategies for Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Designing online mathematics learning strategies to improve work efficiency for current practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can apply a demand-driven approach to design effective online mathematics learning experiences.
Through project-based learning, learners can develop at least two practical online mathematics education strategies applicable to real-world contexts.
Learners can design and operate a formative assessment system for small groups (1–10 members) using digital tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
